name: Imolicious
description:
After the death of their parents, Wataru Akimiya and stepsister Kanako starting to live together. Still being college students, it's really tough for them, but they manage to have a pretty normal life. Summer is near and so Watarus lust for his stepsister is growing. Day after day it's getting harder for Wataru to hold back ...
Will he be able to suppress his forbidden feelings for his stepsister, or will he break a taboo?
